Toggle a Shiny actionButton on a condition

Source: R/iSEE-extras.R
INTERNAL_disableButtonIf.Rd

If condition is met, the button is disabled and its label is set to inactiveLabel. Otherwise, the button is enabled and its label is set to activeLabel.

.disableButtonIf(id, condition, inactiveLabel, activeLabel, session)

Arguments

id

The input slot that used to access the value.
condition

The condition that disables the action button.
inactiveLabel

Label of the button if inactive.
activeLabel

Label of the button if active.
session

The session object passed to function given to shinyServer.

Contents

  • Arguments

Author

Kevin Rue-Albrecht
